titles.title: As For Me, I Will Call On the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As for me, I will call on the Lord,
I will call on my God,
Oh, early in the morning,
I will lift my voice to Thee,
For You are my helper,
My helper in all things,
You have delivered me from all my troubles.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I will praise Thy Name,
I will sacrifice my life to Thee,
I will praise Thy Name,
I will sacrifice my life to Thee,
Oh Lord, You are my strength.
